title: Mallika Sarabhai's multi-media dance-drama in Hyderabad
text: Danseuse, activist, actor, Dr Mallika Sarabhai, performed in the city at a cultural meet on Friday where she incorporated various nuances of dance, drama, music and multi-media to make a statement about women's empowerment. The performance, called 'Sva Kranti', was based on the Gandhian ways that women could adopt to question and ponder their role in society. There were on-stage imagined dialogues with Mahatma Gandhi, where Mallika raised some questions that are vital in any woman's journey, especially when they want to go against the established societal norms. This performance was preceded by a musical performance by city artistes Jaywant Naidu on Hawaiian guitar and Swaroop Mamidipudi on flute.
